```{r}
xkcd_line <- function(x, y, color) {
  len <- length(x);
  rg <- par("usr");
  yjitter <- (rg[4] - rg[3]) / 1000;
  xjitter <- (rg[2] - rg[1]) / 1000;
  x_mod <- x + rnorm(len) * xjitter;
  y_mod <- y + rnorm(len) * yjitter;
  lines(x_mod, y_mod, col='white', lwd=10);
  lines(x_mod, y_mod, col=color, lwd=5);
}
 
repro_lambda <- data.frame(dl = seq(-1,1, length.out = 100), 
                           rs = seq(-1,1, length.out = 100),
                           Pace = sample(c("Fast","Slow"), 100, replace = TRUE))
# repro_lambda$JitPnts <- repro_lambda$dl + rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 0.001)
repro_lambda$Pace[repro_lambda$dl < 0] <- sample(c("Fast","Fast","Fast","Fast","Fast","Fast","Slow"),
                                              length(repro_lambda$Pace[repro_lambda$dl < 0]), 
                                              replace = TRUE )
repro_lambda$Pace[repro_lambda$dl < -0.25] <- "Fast"

 
 mapping <- aes(x=x,
               y=y,
               scale=scale,
               ratioxy=ratioxy,
               angleofspine = angleofspine,
               anglerighthumerus = anglerighthumerus,
               anglelefthumerus = anglelefthumerus,
               anglerightradius = anglerightradius,
               angleleftradius = angleleftradius,
               anglerightleg =  anglerightleg,
               angleleftleg = angleleftleg,
               angleofneck = angleofneck,
               color = color )
dataman <- data.frame(x=0,y=0, scale = 0.1, ratioxy = 1,
              angleofspine = -1.5,
              anglerighthumerus = -pi/6,
              anglelefthumerus = pi + pi/6,
              anglerightradius = 0,
              angleleftradius = runif(1,- pi/4, pi/4),
              angleleftleg = 3*pi/2  + pi / 12 ,
              anglerightleg = 3*pi/2  - pi / 12,
              angleofneck = runif(1, min = 3 * pi / 2 - pi/10 , max = 3 * pi / 2 + pi/10),
              color="red")
 

p_replam <- ggplot(repro_lambda, aes(rs, dl))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_jitter(height = 0.1, width = 0.1, aes(shape = Pace))+
  ggtitle("a)")+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = NULL, breaks = NULL)+ 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = NULL, breaks = NULL)+
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(20,4))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed")+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed")+
  xlab("Reproductive strategy")+
  ylab(expression(lambda))+
  theme_xkcd()+
  # theme(legend.position = c(0.5, -0.5))+
  xkcdaxis(range(repro_lambda$rs)*1.15, range(repro_lambda$dl)*1.15)+
  annotate("text", x = 0.75, y = -1.09, label = "iteroparity")+ # High net reproductive rate\n 
  annotate("text", x = -0.68, y = -1.09, label = "semelparity")+ #Low net reproductive rate\n 
  annotate("text", x = -1.1, y = 0.85, angle = 90, label = "growth")+ # population\ngrowth
  annotate("text", x = -1.1, y = -0.75, angle = 90, label = "decline")

ggsave(filename = "C:/Users/DePrengm/OneDrive - Denver Botanic Gardens/P drive/My Documents/UCDenver_phd/Dissertation/Chapter3/Figures/Lambda_IUCN_heuristic.jpg",

p_replam,

       width=100, height=90,units='mm', dpi=300)
  


## if you collapse lambda and reproductive strategy because the two are 1:1 correlated, then across pace of life you are listed if you're fast, not if slow

repro_lambda$IUCN <- "N"
repro_lambda$IUCN[repro_lambda$Pace == "Fast" &

                              length(repro_lambda$IUCN[repro_lambda$Pace == "Fast" &
```

## Seed harvest modeling - how it would change by time horizon by species   
```{r}
set.seed(1234)
shm <- matrix(sort(runif(100, 0,1), decreasing = TRUE), nrow = 10)
colnames(shm) <- paste0(seq(100,10, by = -10), "%")
rownames(shm) <- paste0(seq(100,10, by = -10), "%")
heatmap(shm, Rowv = NA, Colv = NA)


unique(combn(rep(paste0(seq(100,10, by = -10), "%"),2),2, function(x) paste(x[1],x[2], sep="_")))

```


```{r}

ER_values <- sort(runif(100, 0.2,1), decreasing = FALSE)+rnorm(100, 0,0.06)
for(i in 1:100){
  if(ER_values[i] > 1) ER_values[i] <- 1
  if(ER_values[i] < 0) ER_values[i] <- 0
}
shm <- data.frame(Intensity = rep(seq(10,100,10), 10), #rep(paste0(seq(100,10, by = -10), "%"),10),
                  Frequency = rep(seq(10,100,10), each = 10), # rep(paste0(seq(100,10, by = -10), "%"),each = 10),
                  Prob_ext = ER_values)
shm$Prob_ext[shm$Intensity > 70] <- runif(length(shm$Prob_ext[shm$Intensity > 40]), 0.75,1)
shm$Prob_ext[shm$Intensity > 90] <- runif(10, 0.9,1)
shm$Prob_ext[shm$Frequency > 90] <- runif(10, 0.9,1)

ggsave(filename = "C:/Users/DePrengm/OneDrive - Denver Botanic Gardens/P drive/My Documents/UCDenver_phd/Dissertation/Chapter3/Figures/IntFreq_heatmap_timelong.jpg",
ggplot(shm, aes(Intensity, Frequency, fill = Prob_ext))+
  geom_tile()+
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma", direction = -1,
                       name = "Probability\n of Extinction")+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(scale = 1))+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(scale = 1))+
  theme_bw(),
width=160, height=100,units='mm', dpi=300)


shmShort <- shm
```

Simulation
```{r}

virtualPVA <- function(StartPopSize, MPMs, speed = "fast", parity = "itero", annualYN = FALSE, reps = 1000){
  # replicate simulations
  dfout <- do.call(rbind,lapply(1:reps, function(repl){
    Nx <- stable.stage(mean(MPMs))
    if(annualYN){
      vec1 <- matrix(round(Nx*(StartPopSize/Nx[2]),0), ncol = 1)
    } else {
      vec1 <- matrix(floor(Nx*(StartPopSize/sum(Nx))), ncol = 1)
    }
    
    # Initialize for loop
    Extant <- c()
    yr <- c()
    mats <- list()
    gentim <- c()
    netrep <- c()
    popsz <- c()
    detlam <- c()
    Time2Ext <- NA
    # for(i in 1:300){
    for(i in 1:150){
      yr[i] <- i
      mats[[i]] <- sample(MPMs,size = 1)[[1]]
      if(annualYN){
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]], r = c(1,2), c = 2)
        netrep[i] <- net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]], r=c(1,2), c=2)
      } else {
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]])
        netrep[i] = net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]])
      }
      detlam[i] <- popbio::lambda(mean(mats))
      vec1 <- floor(mats[[i]]%*%vec1)
      if(annualYN){
        popsz[i] <- vec1[2]
      } else {
        popsz[i] <- sum(vec1)
      }
      Extant[i] <- if(popsz[i]<1) 0 else 1
      if(Extant[i] == 0) Time2Ext <- i
      if(popsz[i] == 0) break
    }
    
    dfMPM <- data.frame(PopSize = popsz, Year = yr, parity = parity, speed = speed, GenTime = gentim,
                        netrep = netrep,
                        Extant = Extant, StPopSz = StartPopSize, Time2Extinction = Time2Ext,
                        Replicate = repl, detlam = detlam)
    dfMPM
  }))
  dfout
}
```

```{r}
library(meta)

# Standardized mean diffference between two groups G1, G2
# Cohen's d = mean(G1)-mean(G2)/SD_pooled
# Glass's delta = mean(G1)-mean(G2)/SD_control - for when the SD of the two groups differ, homogeneity of variance assumption is violated and shouldn't pool the SD
# Hedges' g = mean(G1)-mean(G2)/SD_pooled *
#     * SD_pooled = sqrt(( sum(G1-mean(G1))^2 + sum(G2-mean(G2))^2 )/ n_g1 + n_g2 -2)

x <- split(paceparity[paceparity$speed != "all",], list(paceparity$StPopSz[paceparity$speed != "all"],
                                                        paceparity$speed[paceparity$speed != "all"],
                                                        paceparity$parity[paceparity$speed != "all"]))[[1]]
SMD_paceparity <- do.call(rbind,lapply(split(paceparity[paceparity$speed != "all",],
                                             list(paceparity$StPopSz[paceparity$speed != "all"],
                                                  paceparity$speed[paceparity$speed != "all"],
                                                  paceparity$parity[paceparity$speed != "all"])),
                                       function(x){
                                         data.frame(StPopSz = x$StPopSz[1], parity = x$parity[1], 
                                                    speed = x$speed[1], 
                                                    meanGenTime = mean(x$GenTime), 
                                                    meannetrep = mean(x$netrep), 
                                                    meanLam = mean(x$detlam),
                                                    Gmean = mean(x$Time2Extinction[x$Year==1], na.rm = TRUE), 
                                                    Gsd = sd(x$Time2Extinction[x$Year==1], na.rm = TRUE))
                                         }))

SMD_all <- do.call(rbind, lapply(split(paceparity[paceparity$speed == "all",],

                                                    speed = x$speed[1],

                                                    meannetrep = mean(x$netrep), 
                                                    meanLam = mean(x$detlam),
                                                    Gmean = mean(x$Time2Extinction[x$Year==1], na.rm = TRUE), 
                                                    Gsd = sd(x$Time2Extinction[x$Year==1], na.rm = TRUE))
                                 }))
lapply(unique(SMD_all$StPopSz), function(i){

})
```
